This blog was created to explore the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic on maternal mortality rates in the United States. The author is Tess Downing, a St. Lawrence University senior studying Statistics and Public Health. The purpose of this blog is to learn more about the affects of infectious diseases on the pregnant population.
